answers.answer: Does your son like things that are high in carbs?  Rice Mashed potatoes mac and cheese. pasta ronis?  Make a normal meal meat with two or three sides.  Only make sure that you offer a meat a HIGH CARB and a veggie or something.  I have an almost 9 year old who is really small for his age he just hit 52 and it helps, also have you thought about sports for him?  Football has worked great for my son he gained 9 pounds from football so you can imagine how small he was before football!!!!  I mean he was tiny.  Also adding like a slim fast "candy bar" meal to go bar to his lunch and breakfast will increase his caloric intake.  You can use the carnation instant breakfast shake with his breakfast instead of as his breakfast.  Ensure isn't what I would use to be honest.  I don't really like them and they aren't made for children if you want to do give that kind of drink try pediasure it is meant for children.  Good luck and please let me know what happens
